issues.description: The template’s addGuestStudents method signature (int, boolean) does not match the problem description and the solution, which both specify a single int parameter. This mismatch will prevent students from implementing the method correctly and cause test failures.

The template’s addGuestStudents method signature includes an extra boolean parameter (validateInput) that is not mentioned in the problem statement or present in the solution. The problem and solution expect a single-parameter method addGuestStudents(int), so students will be unable to match the required task to the provided stub.
issues.suggested_fix: Adjust the template method signature to match the problem and solution by removing the boolean parameter. For example: public void addGuestStudents(int numberOfNewGuestStudents)
